name: Hover Biker ( 3D Simulation Game )
description:
Hover Biker is a straight-forward, easy to play, fun flight control game with plenty of levels to enjoy. The aim of this game is to land the Hover Bike on the specified place on each level but before that you are supposed to take the hover bike from all the rings.Fly your Hover Bike across various landscapes – flying over different cities, countries and continents and different terrains. Ready to travel the world on this amazing Hover Bike? Good, just make sure you don't crash into buildings.

Features:
* Intelligent Missions To Give You A Tough Competition.
* Crazy Addictive Experience.
* Smooth And Easy Game Play
* Environments That Keeps Changing
* Real Animations And Physics
